Pre-Game Insights: Houston Rockets demonstrate excellent play on defense, allowing only 106.6 points per game on average, which is third place in the league.
Houston Rockets currently sit in third place in the Western Conference with a 21-11 record.
Houston Rockets lost two games in a row before the matchup with Dallas, including a 112:113 loss to Minnesota and a 100-104 loss to Miami.
Amen Thompson of the Houston Rockets will miss the next two matches due to a mass brawl during the game against Miami.
Dallas Mavericks have three losses in the last four games due to Luka Doncic's injury.
Luka Doncic suffered an injury during a Christmas Day home game against Minnesota, which Dallas lost 99-105.
Dallas Mavericks currently hold the fourth line in the Western Conference with a balance of 20-13.
Luka Doncic is expected to miss about a month, which may impact Dallas' position in the standings.
